name: Gun Bots
description:
Customize your Gun Bots to fight through 7 unique worlds with different weather conditions that become more challenging as you progress.

Level up, increase skills, and buy care packages that contain different parts for your Gun Bots to get stronger!

FEATURES

• Customize Gun Bots!
    - Gun Controller System -- Controls the firing system of your Gun Bot.
    - Frame -- Dictates the health of the Gun Bot.
    - Barrel -- Dictates the damage of the Gun Bot.
    - Clip -- Dictates the ammo capacity of the Gun Bot.
    - Mod -- Allows a chance for various effects such as crown control and utility.

- Grid base placement system for your Gun Bots!
    - With the ability to reposition and reload.
    - Bob and weave through projectile fire or protect a Gun bot by placing another one in front.

- Level up as you progress!
    - Increase skills for every level up such as more damage, more health, more ammo.

- Over 150+ parts to collect!
    - Get stronger! Purchase Care Packages that provide a variety of Gun Bot parts to upgrade with.
